mapper.select: SELECT Q.QUESTION_ID, Q.USER_ID, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT, QUESTION_REGISTER_DATETIME, QUESTION_IS_PUBLIC, QUESTION_LIKE_COUNT, DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE, READ_COUNT, NVL(BOOKMARKED_COUNT, 0) AS "BOOKMARKED_COUNT", NVL(ANSWER_COUNT, 0) AS "ANSWER_COUNT" FROM TBL_QUESTION Q LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.QUESTION_ID, BOOKMARKED_COUNT, ANSWER_COUNT FROM ( SELECT QUESTION_ID, COUNT(USER_ID) BOOKMARKED_COUNT FROM TBL_QUESTION_BOOKMARK GROUP BY QUESTION_ID ) B FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT QUESTION_ID, COUNT(ANSWER_ID) ANSWER_COUNT FROM TBL_ANSWER GROUP BY QUESTION_ID ) R ON B.QUESTION_ID = R.QUESTION_ID ) C ON Q.QUESTION_ID = C.QUESTION_ID WHERE ROWNUM > #{page} * 10 AND ROWNUM <= #{page} * 10 + 10

SELECT QUESTION.QUESTION_ID, QUESTION.USER_ID, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT, QUESTION_REGISTER_DATETIME, QUESTION_IS_PUBLIC, QUESTION_LIKE_COUNT, DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE, READ_COUNT, NVL(C.BOOKMARK_COUNT, 0) AS "BOOKMARK_COUNT", QUESTION.USER_NAME, QUESTION.USER_PROFILE_PATH, QUESTION.USER_PROFILE_NAME, QUESTION.USER_PROFILE_SIZE, QUESTION.USER_PROFILE_TYPE, QUESTION.USER_PROFILE_UUID FROM ( SELECT QUESTION_ID, Q.USER_ID, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT, QUESTION_REGISTER_DATETIME, QUESTION_IS_PUBLIC, QUESTION_LIKE_COUNT, DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE, READ_COUNT, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_PROFILE_PATH, U.USER_PROFILE_NAME, U.USER_PROFILE_SIZE, U.USER_PROFILE_TYPE, U.USER_PROFILE_UUID FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_QUESTION Q ON U.USER_ID = Q.USER_ID AND QUESTION_ID = #{questionId} ) QUESTION LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT QUESTION_ID, COUNT(USER_ID) BOOKMARK_COUNT FROM TBL_QUESTION_BOOKMARK GROUP BY QUESTION_ID ) C ON QUESTION.QUESTION_ID = C.QUESTION_ID
SELECT USER_ID, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT, QUESTION_REGISTER_DATETIME,QUESTION_LIKE_COUNT, DOCTOR_DEPARTMENT_TYPE, READ_COUNT FROM TBL_QUESTION ORDER BY READ_COUNT DESC
